snippet.title: [PREVIEW] PS2 - Air Ranger: Rescue Helicopter 2 (HD, 60FPS)
snippet.description:
This is first 15 minutes of Air Ranger: Rescue Helicopter 2 for Playstation 2.

If you like and enjoy our video you can buy us a coffee.
https://ko-fi.com/kawaiigames
DONATIONS: https://streamlabs.com/kawaiigamesie

Air Ranger: Rescue Helicopter is a helicopter simulator video game released for the Sony PlayStation 2, developed by ASK Corporation and published by Midas. The game was released on March 29, 2001 in Japan, and November 15, 2002 for Europe. The game was never released in North America. In the game the player must take the role of a Rescue Helicopter pilot, and complete missions involving accidents such as car crashes or fires.A sequel to Air Ranger has been released for PlayStation 2. Air Ranger 2 allows the player to pilot rescue and law enforcement helicopters. All the helicopters from the previous game are available with a few extra helicopters such as the Eurocopter AS365 Dauphin and Sikorsky H-53. (Source: Wikipedia)

Air Ranger: Rescue Helicopter 2
Developer: ASK
Publisher: ASK
Platform: Playstation 2, PS2
Release: Oct 30, 2003
